results.name: Riordan array (1, x*f(x)) where f(x)is the g.f. of A006318.
comment: Triangle T(n,k), 0<=k<=n, read by rows, given by [0, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 1, ...] DELTA [1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938 . Inverse is Riordan array (1, x*(1-x)/(1+x)).
T(n, r) gives the number of [0,r]-covering hierarchies with n segments terminating at r (see Kreweras work). - _Michel Marcus_, Nov 22 2014
link: G. Kreweras, Sur les hiérarchies de segments, Cahiers du Bureau Universitaire de Recherche Opérationnelle, Institut de Statistique, Université de Paris, #20 (1973), see page 15.
